question: In a CE (Common Emitter) amplifier, the output is: (ECE 2021)
options: 180 degrees out of phase with the input
90 degrees out of phase with the input
45 degrees out of phase with the input
correctAnswer: 180 degrees out of phase with the input

question: The time constant of an RL series circuit is: (ECE 2021)

options: Sending multiple signals over a single channel
Sending a single signal over multiple channels
correctAnswer: Sending multiple signals over a single channel
